content.description:
PERCENT OF LAND USED FOR AGRICULTURE, FOR SELECTED REGIONS

Source: Food and Agriculture Organization

The graph shows trends in the percent of each regionâ€™s total land area used for agriculture.
content.question:
A. Using the graph, compare the trend lines for the region of Europe and the region of East Asia and the Pacific for the 1986 to 2016 time period.

B. Explain how changes in population have affected the percent of land that is used for farming in the Middle East and North Africa.

C. Explain how agricultural practices can have variable effects on environmental sustainability depending on the climate conditions of the region.

D. Using the region of Latin America and the Caribbean, explain why large-scale commercial agricultural operations are replacing small family farms.
